item.description:
UPDATE:  The Rattlesnake has power and is open for business, so the meetup is on as scheduled!!

 

Come meet like-minded adventure travelers who are interested in exploring exciting and off-the-beaten-path destinations around the world. Share stories of past adventures and talk about future ones! It doesn't matter whether you are a solo traveler, a couple or just friends; everyone is welcome. Please contact me if you'd like to attend so I can be sure to keep an eye out for you. Email Jeff through MeetUp.

 

We try to meet at the high tables toward the back of the Rattlesnake Bar (384 Boylston St in Boston)... I will be wearing an obnoxious and easy to spot yellow baseball hat... with a beer in hand.  Come and introduce yourself.
item.how_to_find_us: Tall tables at the back of the bar - Look for Jeff... I will be wearing an obnoxious and easy to spot yellow baseball hat... with beer in hand.
item.name: Boston International Adventure Travel Club March Meetup
